meanings.definition: Failure or refusal to conform to a prevailing rule or practice.
meanings.sent1: Her nonconformity to the school dress code caused quite a stir.
meanings.sent2: The artist's nonconformity to traditional painting techniques made her work stand out.
meanings.sent3: The penguin's nonconformity to the waddle dance routine amused the zoo visitors.
meanings.sent4: His nonconformity to the office culture was like a splash of color in a sea of gray suits.
meanings.sent5: The nonconformity of the rebellious teenager was as bright as a neon sign.

meanings.definition: A person who does not conform to an established church.
meanings.sent1: The nonconformity decided to start his own spiritual group.
meanings.sent2: She was known in the community as a nonconformity due to her unique beliefs.
meanings.sent3: The nonconformity's refusal to attend the traditional church service raised eyebrows.
meanings.sent4: He stood out in the congregation like a nonconformity in a sea of conformity.
meanings.sent5: The nonconformity's presence in the church was as striking as a bolt of lightning.
